description.value:
You make a ranged Strike with a thrown weapon you already have in your hand, Stride, and then @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Interact] to draw another weapon.

Special If you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Rage]{Raging}, and end the Stride adjacent to an enemy, that enemy is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Off-Guard] against the next Strike you make against it with the weapon you drew before the end of your next turn.
